definitions.definition: Someone (or something) who is loved; a darling.

definitions.example: The crown had many precious gemstones.   This building work needs site access, and tell the city council that I don't care about a few lorry tyre ruts across their precious grass verge.
My precious daughter is to marry.
He spent hours painting the eyes of the portrait, which his fellow artists regarded as a bit precious.

definitions.definition: Contrived to be cute or charming.

definitions.example: There is precious little we can do.
